akn:content.akn:p: (a) The proposed budget for the Administration submitted by the President for each fiscal year shall be accompanied by documents showing—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Additional Budget Information Upon Request by Committees.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) The Administration shall make available, upon request from the Committee on Science and Technology of the House of Representatives or the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation of the Senate—
(c) The Administration shall provide, at a minimum, the following information in its annual budget justification:

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Estimate of Gross Receipts and Proposed Use of Funds Related to Lease of Property.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Each annual budget request shall include an annual estimate of gross receipts and collections and proposed use of all funds collected pursuant to section 20145 of this title.
